Name: Fantasy Mosaics 22: Summer Vacation
About the game: The penguin family are taking a summer vacation and travelling to the south pole to meet their friends! Are they going to discover even more colors to enhance mosaic puzzles? Are you up to the challenge of this new installment of Fantasy Mosaics? Then let's go join the penguins and have fun discovering what it's like exploring the South pole! Along the way you will uncover new pixel art images in a variety of colors! - Mosaic puzzles with an enhanced color palette - Pixel art mosaic challenges - Explore the South pole - Puzzles based on logic
